optionalInfo.care:
Do not machine wash.
Clean with a wet towel or wash by hand very gently.
optionalInfo.production: This vintage jacket is hand painted painted with acrylic paint on the back, covered with a matte acrylic finisher which makes it water resistant. The jacket features Frida Kahlo.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: This one of a kind jacket has a light blue colour, two pockets with buttons on the chest and two slit pockets on the front. The item has button details at the end of the sleeves and can be closed through buttons on the front.
